attributes.action: Build more council houses for local people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More council houses to be built as a matter of urgency for citizens,due to over crowding in Britain due to influx of thousands citizens from abroad and not enough social housing to meet the needs of many who are born in UK.It is our Human Right to have a home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
